title: Photo Gallery with Hero Transitions
description: Build a photo gallery with smooth Hero transitions.
instructions: Create a grid of photos that expands to full-screen when tapped. Use Hero widgets to animate the selected photo from its grid position to the center of the screen. Include a custom flightShuttleBuilder that adds a shadow effect during the transition.

hints.text: Use unique hero tags like 'photo-$index' for each image
The flightShuttleBuilder receives an animation parameter you can use to animate properties
Use AnimatedBuilder inside flightShuttleBuilder to rebuild on animation changes

commonMistakes.mistake: Using the same hero tag for multiple images
commonMistakes.consequence: Hero animation breaks with duplicate tag error

commonMistakes.correction: Ensure the tag string is exactly the same on both screens
